subject: [Mhln] Dreamweaver ready to download
body:
And must I wholly banish hence these red and golden juices, and pay my vows to Abstinence, that pallidest of Muses?

Life is change. Growth is optional. Choose wisely.

Nothing can be made of nothing he who has laid up no material can produce no combination.

Other lands have their vitality in a few, a class, but we have it in the bulk of our people.

When men speak of the future, the Gods laugh.

Be careful: they have arms, and no alternatives.

They are horribly tedious when they are good husbands, and abominably conceited when they are not.

Goodness is achieved not in a vacuum, but in the company of other men, attended by love.

The traveler sees what he sees, the tourist see what he has come to see.

I know there's a Derby out there with my name on it.

Not to expose your true feelings to an adult seems to be instinctive from the age of seven or eight onwards.

You get what you set out to do.

No Fear.
